Row.Text: The [B]Gallic warrior[/B] is stronger than regular warrior.

[LIST][LI]The Gallic warrior costs more [B][icon:YIELD_GOLD]Gold[/B] but he is stronger and ignores movement penalties on Vegetated terrain.[LI]The Gauls can build the [B]Sanctuary of Corent[/B], an unique wonder that provides [B][icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture[/B] and [B][icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS]Happiness[/B]. [/LIST]
